channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Hold Mechanical Engineering Review
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 20, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to take part in this information session covering Rensselaer’s online, project-based Master of Engineering program in Mechanical Engineering. Experienced engineers are asked to take on larger and more complex tasks as they progress in their careers, and this program provides the necessary breadth and depth, no matter where one’s career takes them.
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Fall Away Semester Registration Event to be Held August 14
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 14, 2024 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM - Please stop by the CCPD to register for an Arch experience! Staff members will be on hand to help students with the planning and registration process, and lunch will be provided starting at noon. All students must attend, so if you cannot show up during this session, please contact Erika Cary to schedule a different time.
item.author: Students

item.title: Finance Announces Helen Grzymala’s Retirement
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 20, 2024 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM - School’s out forever, and this calls for a party! After more than 29 years of service at Rensselaer, Helen Grzymala will be retiring, and the campus community is welcome to join Finance in honoring her at a reception to be held in the Heffner Alumni House Great Room.
item.author: Community

item.title: Webex Education Connector Becomes Webex LTI Legacy
item.description: As of June 2024, the Webex Education Connector — utilized to embed Webex meetings in a course in Blackboard — has been migrated to the Webex LTI Legacy tool, which has been updated and improved, and has a new look. Please watch for more changes the week of August 19!
item.author: Community

item.title: Information Session for 2025 Project RFP: Quantum Computing Track 4 to be Held August 16
item.description: From 1:00PM to 3:00PM on Friday, August 16, RPI and IBM representatives will discuss details of the Track 4 RFP and answer questions regarding the scope and process for this call. Registration is required to participate; please contact Kathy Fontaine if you have questions.
item.author: Community

item.title: HelioCampus Syllabus Available for Fall Term
item.description:
The HelioCampus syllabus module is available for faculty to access for the fall term beginning on August 5, 2024. Based on the requirements from the Provost’s office, faculty should have their syllabi published in HelioCampus by September 11, 2024.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
